definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The legitimacy of women's studies as a discipline has for long been challenged by academic circles.
sentences.chinese: 婦女學的學科合法性長期受到學術界的質疑。

sentences.english: Due to the lack of legitimacy, the justice of the war is prevalently challenged.
sentences.chinese: 由於師出無名，這場戰爭始終存在着合法性危機。

sentences.english: Domestic scholars have generally denied legality of anti circumvention.
sentences.chinese: 國內學者普遍對反規避措施的合法性持否定觀點。

sentences.english: The anti-circumvention clause has its' validity and rationality.
sentences.chinese: 反規避條款有其存在的合法性和合理性。

sentences.english: The second chapter analyses public security contract validity and rationality.
sentences.chinese: 第二章分析治安承包的合法性與合理性。

sentences.english: Rosoff told the meeting that the Council's legitimacy depends on its reform.
sentences.chinese: 羅塞夫在會上指出，安理會的合法性有賴於它的改革。

sentences.english: Eventually the Egyptian government would come to refuse to recognize the Anglo-Egyptian Condominium as legal.
sentences.chinese: 最後，埃及政府開始拒絕承認英埃共管的合法性。

sentences.english: One principle the West must insist on is the legitimacy of Georgia’s government.
sentences.chinese: 一條原則是，西方必須堅持格魯吉亞政府的合法性。

sentences.english: But the IMF suffers from problems of eroding legitimacy and inadequate leverage.
sentences.chinese: 不過，IMF面臨着合法性降低和代表率不足的問題。

sentences.english: The emphasis on the Kim family's legitimacy to lead has never been stronger.
sentences.chinese: 在這個當口，更需要加強金家王朝統治的合法性。

sentences.english: The election of the new government was met by a challenge from its opponents.
sentences.chinese: 新政府當選的合法性受到了反對派的挑戰。

sentences.english: This is our little sanity check, the base case.
sentences.chinese: 這是合法性檢查，是基本條件。

sentences.english: Having the original story gives email legends a feeling of legitimacy.
sentences.chinese: 經原故事讓電子郵件傳說的合法性的感覺。

sentences.english: I once again deny the legitimacy of the phone interceptions.
sentences.chinese: 我再次否認這些電話記錄的合法性。

sentences.english: Contemporaneity must have a close connection to the truth in order to attain legitimacy.
sentences.chinese: 當代性必需與真理緊密關聯才具有合法性。

sentences.english: We investigate the legal status of every potential acquisition.
sentences.chinese: 我們調查每項可能收購的作品的合法性。

definition: probative value/strength of evidence in legal proof/relevance
